file_content.text: Thank you for bringing my daughter back to me!
Nnnnnnghhh....
My daughter... where is she? Please tell me the soldiers didn't....
She asked me to give you her ring before she died.
I got there too late.
Your daughter's a traitor, and she's been justly punished for it. Here's her ring as proof.
She's being tortured.
No... not true. She's... good girl. Qo'el is a good girl.
Suit yourself.
Your daughter had a lot of people fooled, including you, apparently.
I wouldn't be so sure.
Maybe if you weren't so easily convinced that she was a good girl, this wouldn't have happened.
It's probably your fault.
I can't believe it. I won't. She was my daughter. She was... she was a good girl.
She's dead, but I managed to get her ring.
I've got bad news.
No... Qo'el... no....
Please... leave me alone. I can't... oh Qo'el....
Condolences.
Thank you for finding out for me. At least... at least I know what happened.
She deserved what she got.
It was justice.
If I were you, I'd stay out of the Republic's way.
Watch yourself.
But I didn't... I don't know what you're talking about... she was a good girl. She didn't deserve this.
Thank you, thank you. You saved my daughter!
Everyone, this is the good soldier who saved my daughter!
Everyone, this is the good person who saved my daughter!
She called to tell me what you've done, and how grateful she is. I--I--I can't thank you enough.
It was nothing.
You're very gracious. Thank you.
You don't happen to have any kind of reward for me, do you?
About my payment.
We need everything we've got if we're going to escape this war zone. I'm sorry.
I'm glad I could help, and I'm glad to see you're doing better.
Just happy to serve.
Yes, now that my daughter's coming back to me. Thank you so much.
Please, my daughter. You have to help my daughter. She's--she's been taken to Fort Garnik!
You! Get away from me... you did this to me! Dirty soldiers... beating an old man, stealing his daughter.
Whatever those soldiers did to you, this soldier here had nothing to do with it.
Don't blame my friend.
Then maybe... your friend won't turn... blind eye. Like the rest.
Please... I'm--I'm at the end of my rope... soldiers... soldiers beat me, took my belongings, my daughter.
They were criminals, not good soldiers.
Those men should be arrested.
I promise, whoever did this to you was not acting under Republic orders.
It wasn't me.
Then help me. Don't turn... ah... a blind eye, like--like the rest.
Damn soldiers. If you can't trust them, who can you trust?
What's the world coming to?
They wouldn't have done it without a good reason.
I'm sure you deserved it.
No... jus--just trying to make a living like anyone....
Please help... my--my daughter means everything to me.
Help me get my daughter back. Help.
I don't understand why soldiers would take your daughter. Where would they take her?
Why did they do this?
I--I don't know... there's--there's been... there's been a string of abductions lately.
But I never thought they'd take her. I--I--I never thought they'd take my Qo'el.
Where did they take her?
Forget it.
Please... they'll hurt her. Don't let her die.
They... they were headed toward the fort. Please... please find my daughter.
I'll do it.
I suppose I could take a look next time I'm at the fort.
I guess....
We'll see.
Please... hurry. I--I--I want to see my daughter again.
Nnnnngggghh... the pain....
Ugh. Please somebody... help... s--somebody....
Why did they take her?
Where did they take her?
